weloveclouds.server.requests.validator

Class KVServerRequestsValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • weloveclouds.server.requests.validator.KVServerRequestsValidator

  • public class KVServerRequestsValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates different objects which are used in the requests (IKVClientRequest, IKVServerRequest, IKVECSRequest} served by the KVServer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KVServerRequestsValidator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void validateHashRange(weloveclouds.commons.hashing.models.HashRange range)
      A HashRange is valid, if it is not null.
      static void validateHashRanges(java.util.Set<weloveclouds.commons.hashing.models.HashRange> hashRanges)
      HashRanges are valid, if its set is not null and the encapsulated HashRange instances are valid.
      static void validateMovableStorageUnits(java.util.Set<MovableStorageUnit> storageUnits)
      MovableStorageUnits are valid, if:
      (1) its set is not null,
      (2) neither underlying stored movable storages units are null,
      (3) neither keys stored in the respective movable storage unit is null.
      static void validateRingMetadata(weloveclouds.commons.hashing.models.RingMetadata ringMetadata)
      A RingMetadata is valid, if it is not null and the encapsulated RingMetadataPart instances are valid.
      static void validateRingMetadataPart(weloveclouds.commons.hashing.models.RingMetadataPart ringMetadataPart)
      A RingMetadataPart is valid, if:
      (1) it is not null,
      (2) neither the underlying hash range is null,
      (3)and the underlying ServerConnectionInfo is valid.
      static void validateServerConnectionInfos(java.util.Set<ServerConnectionInfo> connectionInfos)
      ServerConnectionInfos are valid, if its set is not null and the encapsulated ServerConnectionInfo instances are valid.
      static void validateValueAsKVKey(java.lang.String key)
      A KVEntry key is invalid, if its size is bigger than 20 bytes.
      static void validateValueAsKVValue(java.lang.String value)
      A KVEntry value is invalid, if its size is bigger than 120 kbytes.
